H0.text: Harvey Littleton, Dominick Labino, Dale Chihuly, Dante Marioni, Fritz Driesbach and Marvin Lipofsky are associated with producing art from what material. Metal

H1.text: Harvey Littleton, Dominick Labino, Dale Chihuly, Dante Marioni, Fritz Driesbach and Marvin Lipofsky are associated with producing art from what material. Wood

H2.text: Harvey Littleton, Dominick Labino, Dale Chihuly, Dante Marioni, Fritz Driesbach and Marvin Lipofsky are associated with producing art from what material. Ceramic

H3.text: Harvey Littleton, Dominick Labino, Dale Chihuly, Dante Marioni, Fritz Driesbach and Marvin Lipofsky are associated with producing art from what material. Glass

A4.text: The goal was to melt glass in a small furnace so individual artists could use glass as an art medium in a non-industrial setting.

A5.text: This was the workshop that would stimulate the studio glass movement that spread around the world.
